clik documentation¶

clik is a C library containing codes to compute different approximations for the Planck likelihood. Wrappers are provided so that the functions can also be called from python and f90.

  • Authors
  • Design choices
    • A likelihood is entirely defined by a likelihood file.
    • The library computes an approximation of the log likelihood
    • The input of the compute function are multipoles of the power spectra and nuisance parameters.
    • Pitfalls
  • Installing
    • Requisites
    • Install tool
    • Advanced configuration options
